"Truxtun": "Looks like you're eligible to join the Kvaris Independent Corps. That's no small feat."
"It should be alright to tell you about the enemies you'll be facing..."
"But first, just to be sure, I'd like to see what you're capable of."
"The person in charge of the Corps supplies would be Leso next to me at Kvaris Camp."
"I'd like you to exchange some goods with her. That should serve as your proof of strength."
